content:
However, I need to clarify that I'm a large language model, I don't have personal experiences or interactions with you or any pet supply stores. I'm here to provide general information and assist with your queries.

But I'm happy to chat with you about your experiences! It sounds like you had a great experience with Petco's loyalty program and got a nice discount on your first purchase. That's always exciting!

If you have any more questions or need help with anything else, feel free to ask. I'm here to assist you!
